Package com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search

Class FieldText

java.lang.Object
com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search.FieldText
public class FieldText extends Object

An object recording different stats for a lucene text field. Is stable according to a state of the index, could be cached. Record all counts useful for stats. For performances, all fields of the class are visible, so it is unsafe.

Provide slices of stats for Terms as s sorted Iterator

  • Constructor Details

    • FieldText

      public FieldText(org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader reader, String fieldName) throws IOException
      Build the dictionaries and stats. Each form indexed for the field will be identified by an int (formid). This id will be in freq order, so that the form with formid=1 is the most frequent for the index (formId=0 is the empty string). This order allows optimizations for co-occurrences matrix,
      Parameters:
      reader - a lucene index reader.
      fieldName - name of a lucene text field.
      Throws:
      IOException - Lucene errors.

      public FormEnum filter(FormEnum results) throws IOException
      Populate a dictionary of forms by a bitSet of documents, the filter is found in FormEnum.filter
      Parameters:
      results - the form enumerator to populate.
      Returns:
      the form enumerator populated.
      Throws:
      IOException - Lucene errors.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • formOccs

      public long formOccs(String form)
      Get global length (occurrences) for a form. Returns -1 if unknown. Should never be 0.
      Parameters:
      form - a form to search.
      Returns:
      count of occurrences for this form, or -1 if form absent of index.

    • formOccs

      public long formOccs(org.apache.lucene.util.BytesRef bytes)
      Get global length (occurrences) for a form. Returns -1 if unknown. Should never be 0.
      Parameters:
      bytes - form as native lucene bytes.
      Returns:
      count of occurrences for this form, or -1 if form absent of index.

    • forms

      public FormEnum forms(org.apache.lucene.util.BitSet docFilter) throws IOException
      Get forms for this field, filtered by a set of docIds.
      Parameters:
      docFilter - a set of docId.
      Returns:
      an object to sort and loop forms.
      Throws:
      IOException - lucene errors.

    • forms

      public FormEnum forms(org.apache.lucene.util.BitSet docFilter, Tag.TagFilter formFilter, OptionDistrib distrib) throws IOException
      Count of occurrences by term for a subset of the index, defined as a BitSet. Returns an iterator sorted according to a scorer. If scorer is null, default is count of occurrences.
      Parameters:
      docFilter - a set of docId.
      formFilter - a set of formId.
      distrib - scoring algorithm.
      Returns:
      an object to sort and loop forms.
      Throws:
      IOException - lucene errors.

    • forms

      public FormEnum[] forms(int parts, int[] classifier, Tag.TagFilter wordFilter, OptionDistrib distrib) throws IOException
      Get scored words for a partition of the full index. A part is a sequential int between [0, parts[. Parts are given as a vector of ints where classifier[docId]=part. If part < 0, the docId is not counted. Results are returned like an array of FormEnum, where FormEnum[part] is the scored list of term for the partition.
      Parameters:
      parts - count of parts.
      classifier - vector of ints where classifier[docId]=part.
      wordFilter - filter words by tag.
      distrib - scorer.
      Returns:
      a set of dictionaries, one for each part.
      Throws:
      IOException - lucene errors.

    • occs

      public int occs(int docId)
      Total count of occurrences (except empty positions) for a docId.
      Parameters:
      docId - lucene internal doc id.
      Returns:
      occurrences count for this doc.

    • valueId

      public int valueId(org.apache.lucene.util.BytesRef bytes, org.apache.lucene.util.BitSet docFilter) throws IOException
      Check if a form is present in a partition of the index. Returns its formId or -1 if not found, like BytesRefHash.find(BytesRef).
      Parameters:
      bytes - a word form as bytes.
      docFilter - set of docIds.
      Returns:
      formId if found, or -1 if not found in partition.
      Throws:
      IOException - Lucene errors.

    • valueIds

      public int[] valueIds(CharSequence[] forms, org.apache.lucene.util.BitSet docFilter) throws IOException
      Returns a sorted array of valueId ready for binarySearch, or null if no words found.
      Parameters:
      forms - set of forms as CharSequence
      docFilter - set of DocId to include.
      Returns:
      sorted set of formId.
      Throws:
      IOException - lucene errors.

    • norm

      public static org.apache.lucene.util.BytesRef[] norm(org.apache.lucene.util.BytesRefHash dic, CharSequence[] values)
      Normalize a list of forms to search in an IndexReader. Filter null and forms absent from the dictionary.
      Parameters:
      dic - a dictionary of terms extracted from a field.
      values - collection of form to test against dictionary.
      Returns:
      set of unique values, sorted for efficient search with TermsEnum.seekExact(BytesRef).

    • occs

      public long occs()
      Global count of occurrences (except empty positions) for all index.
      Returns:
      total occurrences for the index.

    • valueId

      public int valueId(org.apache.lucene.util.BytesRef bytes)
      Returns valueId >= 0 if exists, or -1 if not, like BytesRefHash.find(BytesRef)
      Parameters:
      bytes - reusable utf8 bytes to look for.
      Returns:
      valueId >= 0 if found, -1 otherwise.

    • valueId

      public int valueId(CharSequence form)

      Parameters:
      form - char version of a form.
      Returns:
      valueId >= 0 if found, -1 otherwise.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a sorted array of valueId found, or null if no form found for this fields.
      Throws:
      IOException - lucene errors.

    • maxValue

      public int maxValue()
      Count of different values. Biggest valueId+1 (like lucene IndexReader.maxDoc()). Used to build fixed array of form id.
      Returns:
      max value id.
